headline: Linde to Expand Supply of Industrial Gases to Samsung in South Korea
summary: WOKING, England, April 29, 2025--Linde (Nasdaq: LIN) announced today that it will increase its supply of ultra-high-purity atmospheric, process and specialty gases to Samsung’s world-class semiconductor manufacturing complex in Pyeongtaek, South Korea.
